title: Freedmen's Bureau Records: John W. Jordan to Orlando Brown, July 31, 1868
summary: In his report, Jordan notes the high demand for labor and the opportunities for employment for the blacks of Augusta County. He also discusses in some detail the political attitudes of whites in the county.
keywords: Community Values/Local Behavior, Economy, Employment/Labor, Patriotism, Politics/Political Attitudes, Race Relations, Slavery, American Civil War
